com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds

Class PlatWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.GameWorld
      • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.PlatWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameWorld, IGameWorldHeroInputs, DummyEnemyFeature, HeroLifesFeature, HeroLightFeature, LightRechargerFeature, PlatformFeature

    public class PlatWorld
extends GameWorld
implements PlatformFeature, HeroLightFeature, LightRechargerFeature, HeroLifesFeature
    This class manages the game's logic for the platforms mode of the game.
